title: Collegites AI – The Future of Educational Video Creation
narration: Meet Collegites AI the ultimate solution for educators who want to create highquality videos effortlessly. I'm Rahul Saini cofounder and we're here to transform learning with AIpowered video creation.

title: The Big Problem in EdTech
content:
Text-based learning lacks engagement
Video creation is time-consuming & expensive
Ninety percent of educators lack video editing skills
image_desc: EdTech problems, engagement, time, skills. Type: infographic
narration: Students today prefer video content but creating highquality educational videos is a challenge. It's expensive timeconsuming and requires advanced editing skillssomething most educators don't have.

title: Our AI-Powered Solution
content:
AI turns text into engaging videos in seconds
One hundred forty plus languages & multiple formats
Automated narration, animations, and visuals
image_desc: AI video generation, languages, animation. Type: software screenshot
narration: With Collegites AI educators can instantly convert text into engaging videos. Our AI generates narration animations and visualsmaking video creation seamless and scalable.

title: Market Opportunity
content:
India's EdTech market = $5 billion (2025)
Demand for educational video content is booming
No major player solves this problem at scale
image_desc: EdTech market size, growth, demand. Type: graph
narration: The demand for educational video content is skyrocketing. The Indian EdTech market alone is projected to reach 5 billion by two thousand twentyfive and there's no major player addressing this at scale.

title: Business Model
content:
SaaS model: ₹100 per video (AI tool)
Service model: ₹7299 to ₹21499 per month
Target audience: Educators, EdTech startups, YouTubers
image_desc: SaaS pricing, subscription, educators. Type: table
narration: Our business model is simple. Educators and creators can use our SaaS tool at one hundred per video or opt for our endtoend service plans starting at seven thousand two hundred ninetynine per month.

title: Traction & Milestones
content:
Five plus paying customers, ₹50000 ARR
Early market validation & strong demand
Grant funding secured (₹10 lakh)
image_desc: ARR growth, customers, grant. Type: chart
narration: We're already making an impact. With five paying customers and fifty thousand in ARR we've validated our market fit. Plus we've secured a ten lakh grant to accelerate our growth.

title: Use Case - Science Education
content:
Simplifying complex concepts
Engaging visual explanations
Improved student understanding
image_desc: Math education, visual learning, AI. Type: video still
narration: Imagine simplifying complex math concepts with engaging visual explanations. Collegites AI helps improve student understanding by transforming abstract ideas into easily digestible video lessons.

title: Join Us
content:
Looking for investors & strategic partners
Pilots & collaborations open
Contact: contact@logicsyner.com
image_desc: Investment, partnership, collaboration. Type: call to action
narration: We're on a mission to revolutionize educational video creation. Whether you're an investor partner or educatorjoin us in shaping the future of EdTech. Let's make learning more engaging and accessible.
